Cameroon 2 vs. Romania 1 in the 1990 World Cup

Information about the 1st Round Group B game played in the 1990 Soccer World Cup between the National Teams of Romania and Cameroon with details about goals, starters and reserves, substitutions, cards and more.

Game played in the 1990 World Cup, 1st Round Group B

Date: Thursday, June 14, 1990

Cameroon 2 - 1 Romania
Goals:
  Roger Milla 76'
  Roger Milla 86'
  88' Gavril Balint
